Welcome to Mafia game The game models a conflict between two groups:
an informed minority (the mafiosi),
and an uninformed majority (the citizens). Game prepare The best way to play Mafia Mobile is to place the phone between all players so that everyone has free access to it without having to get up. Roles in the game - Mafiosi
- Police officers
- Citizens Mafiosi Their goal is to eliminate the whole city by selecting the player from all the players shown on the screen.
They win if they reach numerical parity with the citizens and police officers. Police officers Their goal is to search the find out who belongs to mafiosi group.
They do it by can selecting a player they think is in the mafia and at the end of the round they will know the truth. Citizens They are attempting to figure out who is in the mafia simply by talking it out at the end of the round, accusing, and seeing who is acting suspicious. Beginning Select number of players and press "Play". Drawing roles for players After entering your name and swiping the screen, the card turns and you can see what role you will play. Hiding your role After seeing your role in the game
(and remembering it!), swipe again to hide your role. Then give the phone to the next player. Game flow There are two phases: night and day.
At night, certain players secretly perform special actions.
During day, players discuss and vote to eliminate one player. These phases alternate with each other until all mafiosi have been eliminated or they reach numerical parity with the citizens. Night All players close their eyes. The moderator (phone) instruct certain roles to open their eyes and select their target from all the targets shown on the phone. Mafia turn After Mafiosi wakes up, their select their victim by clicking their name on the phone.
After that they go to sleep (close their eyes). Police turn After Police officers wakes up, their select player to check by clicking their name on the phone.
After that they go to sleep (close their eyes). Day The city wakes up, all players have their eyes opened now. Now they will see who is killed, and if the police officers knows the truth about the players they previously selected. Talk Now its time to talk and to convince each other who do you think belongs to mafiosi.
The police officers cannot admit their role! Vote The voting phase is similar to the role assignment phase.
Each player take phone to their hand, swipe the card to vote then selects the player that they want to vote on, swipes again to accept their vote and give the phone to the next player. Vote summary" After the last player votes and swipe the last card, voting result will be shown on the screen, now the city will know who they have eliminate." Play the game!
